{{also|leben|lében}} ==German== [[File:Eukaryota diversity 2.jpg|thumb|225px|''verschiedene Formen des '''Lebens''''' — different forms of life (2.2)]] ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|leben}}, from {{inh|de|goh|lebēn}}. Related to the verb {{m|de|leben}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈleːbən/|[ˈleːbm̩]|[ˈleːb(ə)n]}} * {{audio|de|De-leben.ogg|audio}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Leben.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{hyphenation|de|Le|ben}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n||Leben}} # {{lb|de|uncountable}} {{gerund of|de|leben}}: [[living]] #: {{ux|de|Die Kunst des '''Lebens'''|inline=1|t=The art of '''living'''.}} # [[life]]; being [[alive]] ## {{lb|de|uncountable|biology}} a state in which organic entities such as [[animal|animals]], [[plant|plants]] and [[bacteria]] have properties like [[metabolism]], [[adaption]] and [[replication]] ##: {{ux|de|Das '''Leben''' ist nicht an das geistige Bewusstsein gebunden.|inline=1|'''Life''' is not dependent on mental consciousness.}} ## {{lb|de|uncountable|biology}} the entirety of those who are in this state ##: {{ux|de|Die Erde [[quellen|quillt]] über vor '''Leben'''.|inline=1|t=Earth is full of '''life'''.}} ## {{lb|de|countable}} the time period in which one is in this state; the time between [[birth]] and [[death]] ##: {{ux|de|Das '''Leben''' beginnt mit der [[Geburt]] und endet mit dem [[Tod]].|inline=1|t='''Life''' begins with birth and ends with death.}} ##: {{ux|de|Sowas habe ich mein '''Leben''' lang noch nicht getan.|inline=1|I have never done such a thing in my '''life'''.}} ## {{lb|de|uncountable|religion|philosophy}} a state of being in touch or in line with certain [[metaphysical]] forces and [[principle]]s by which biological life is governed ##: {{ux|de|Nicht jeder, der atmet, ist auch wirklich am '''Leben'''.|Not everyone who breathes is really a'''live'''.|inline=1}} # {{lb|de|countable}} [[life]]; [[way of life]] {{gloss|a particular manner of behaving and passing one’s time, whether real or ideal, and whether self-chosen or not}} #: {{ux|de|'''Lebens'''standard|inline=1|t=quality of '''life'''}} #: {{ux|de|ein angenehmes '''Leben'''|inline=1|t=a comfortable '''life'''}} #: {{ux|de|ein christliches '''Leben'''|inline=1|t=a Christian '''life'''}} # {{lb|de|countable}} [[biography]]; [[life]]; life story {{gloss|an account of a person’s life, whether real or virtual}} #: {{ux|de|Das '''Leben''' der Edelgard.|inline=1|t=The '''life''' of Edelgard.}} #: {{ux|de|Sein '''Leben''' weist viele Höhen und Tiefen auf.|inline=1|t=There are many ups and downs in his '''biography'''.}} # {{lb|de|usually|uncountable}} [[existence]]; [[life]] {{gloss|a position one has created for oneself, often manifested in [[success]], [[prosperity]], and [[standing]]}} #: {{ux|de|Frau Schmidt hat sich in all diesen Jahren ein bewundernswertes '''Leben''' aufgebaut.|inline=1|t=Mrs Schmidt has built up an admirable '''life''' in all these years.}} # {{lb|de|usually|uncountable}} [[life]]; precious or beloved thing that someone considers fundamental to their existence #: {{ux|de|Sie ist mein Ein und Alles, mein '''Leben'''!|inline=1|t=She is my one and only, my '''life'''!}} # {{lb|de|countable|video games}} a measure of successful play ## [[life]]; numbers of times a game can be [[play]]ed ##: {{ux|de|Du hast nur noch drei '''Leben''' übrig.|inline=1|t=You only have three '''lives''' left.}} ## [[health]]; [[hit point]]s # {{lb|de|youth|_|slang}} {{ngd|used as the object of certain verbs, often ones that are per se [[intransitive]], for emphasis}} #: {{ux|de|Chill ma’ dein '''Leben'''!|Just chill, okay!|lit=Just chill your '''life'''!|inline=1}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|s}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|existence one has built}} {{l|de|Dasein|g=n}}, {{l|de|Existenz|g=f}} * {{sense|biography}} {{l|de|Biographie|g=f}}; {{l|de|Lebenslauf|g=m}}; {{l|de|Vita|f}} ====Antonyms==== * {{sense|life, the state between birth and death}} {{l|de|Tod|g=m}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de |Ableben |Aufleben |Beleben |Einzelleben |Erleben |Berufsleben |Hundeleben |lebendig |Lebensabend |Lebensabschnitt |Lebensanfang |Lebensart |Lebensaufgabe |Lebensaussicht |Lebensbeginn |Lebensdauer |Lebensende |Lebensenergie |Lebensentwicklung |Lebensenttäuschung |Lebenserfahrung |Lebenserfüllung |Lebenserwartung |lebensfähig |Lebensfaden |Lebensform |Lebensfülle |Lebensgefahr |Lebensgenuss |Lebensgier |Lebensgröße |Lebenshilfe |Lebensintensität |Lebenskraft |Lebenslauf |lebenslustig |Lebenslüge |Lebensmitte |Lebensmittel |Lebensmittelpunkt |lebensmüde |Lebensperspektive |Lebensphase |Lebenspunkt |lebenspendend |Lebensraum |Lebensretter |Lebensschicksal |Lebensstil |Lebensverlust |Lebensverlauf |Lebenswelt |Lebenszeichen |Lebenszeit |Lebenszentrum |Lebenszeugung |Lebensziel |Lebenszuversicht |Lebewesen |Menschenleben |Nachleben |Nachtleben |Privatleben |Überleben |ums Leben kommen |Vereinsleben |Verleben |Vorleben }} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Leib|g=m}} * {{l|de|leben}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
